meanings.definition: A white English-speaking person of British or American descent.
meanings.sent1: The anglo at the store helped me find the right book.
meanings.sent2: My neighbor is an anglo who loves to garden.
meanings.sent3: Why did the anglo bring a teacup to the baseball game?
meanings.sent4: The anglo's presence in the room was as noticeable as a bright light.
meanings.sent5: I will always remember the friendly smile of the anglo I met at the park.

meanings.definition: Of or relating to English-speaking countries or people.
meanings.sent1: She preferred anglo literature over other types of books.
meanings.sent2: The anglo community celebrated their cultural heritage with a festival.
meanings.sent3: The anglo cat meowed in a British accent.
meanings.sent4: Her words were as clear and direct as an anglo handshake.
meanings.sent5: The anglo influence on the language was evident in everyday conversations.
